title: The Endless Love
resume: The young gifted painter Gu Ye Bai is affected by a mental disease, to him, the world has lost all its colors. While preparing for an international arts competition, an accident happens that makes him worried a lot. At this time, he gets to know the cute and amiable sunshine Lu You Yan. She will help him heal his mind and fight for his dream of becoming a recognized painter.
